trans-unit.source: Represents the key identifier clause for a security context token.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityContextKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified context identifier.
For more about the `contextId` parameter, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>.
The unique ID of the security context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityContextKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified context identifier and generation.
For more about the `contextId` parameter, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>.
For more about the `generation` parameter, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A>.
A <xref href="System.Xml.UniqueId"></xref> that represents the Context ID of the security context.
A <xref href="System.Xml.UniqueId"></xref> that refers to the Key generation of the Security Context Token.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityContextKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class with the specified values.
`derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` are used for implied derived keys.
This is supported only on the sending side.
The context ID part of the identifier clause.
The generation part of the identifier clause.
The length of the key being derived.
Gets the ID of the security context.
The unique ID of the security context.
Gets the generation.
The generation.

Compares a specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to the current instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityContextKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to be compared.
`true` if the two instances are equal; otherwise, `false`.

Compares a specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to the current instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityContextKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class with the specified context identifier and generation.
The context ID part of the identifier clause.
The generation part of the identifier clause.
`true` if the two instances are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Provides a text representation of this instance of the class.
A text representation of this instance of the class.
